metadata.title: CVE-2015-4000

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 11 SP1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 11 SP2
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 11 SP3
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 11 SP4

metadata.description: The TLS protocol 1.2 and earlier, when a DHE_EXPORT ciphersuite is enabled on a server but not on a client, does not properly convey a DHE_EXPORT choice, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to conduct cipher-downgrade attacks by rewriting a ClientHello with DHE replaced by DHE_EXPORT and then rewriting a ServerHello with DHE_EXPORT replaced by DHE, aka the "Logjam" issue.

criterions.comment: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 11-SECURITY is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 11 SP1 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 11 SP2 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 11 SP1-LTSS is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 11 SP2-LTSS is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 11 SP1-TERADATA is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 11 SP3 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 11 SP3 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 11 SP3-TERADATA is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 11 SP4 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 11 SP4 is installed
